changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT c.id, r1.name AS premise1, r2.name AS premise2, r3.name AS inference, c.notes, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, c.version FROM network_inference c JOIN existential r1 ON c.premise1 = r1.id JOIN existential r2 ON c.premise2 = r2.id JOIN existential r3 ON c.inference = r3.id JOIN existential up ON c.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.reference = c.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.workspace = w.id
